contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.blogpos.BlogPostContentContentMarkdown:
In an interview with Debbie Tucek, Kentico's Director of Product, Juraj Komloši, Kentico’s CIO, delves into the world of cybersecurity and discusses Kentico’s approach to securing data and services, especially in SaaS environment.
Learn about Kentico’s evolution in security, the importance of risk assessment, and the comprehensive security measures in place. Discover how Kentico ensures data privacy, compliance, and adopts a positive security culture.
